gurmukhi: ਅਕ੍ਰਿੱਤ ਕ੍ਰਿੱਤ ਕਾਰਨੋ ਅਨਿੱਤ ਨਿੱਤ ਹੋਹਿੰਗੇ ॥ ਤਿਅਾਗ ਧਰਮਣੋ ॥ ਤ੍ਰੀਅੰ ਕੁਨਾਰਿ ਸਾਧ ਜੋਹਿੰਗੇ ॥
transliteration: Akritt Kaarano Anitt Nitt Hohenge|| Tiaag Dharmano Treean Kudaar(i) Saadh Johenge||
translation: Forbidden works will always be performed; the saints abandoning the path of dharma, will look for the path of prostitutes;

gurmukhi: ਪਵਿੱਤ੍ਰ ਚਿੱਤ੍ਰ ਚਿੱਤ੍ਰਤੰ ਬਚਿੱਤ੍ਰ ਮਿਤ੍ਰ ਧੋਹਿੰਗੇ ॥ ਅਮਿੱਤ੍ਰ ਮਿੱਤ੍ਰ ਭਾਵਣੋ ਸੁ ਮਿੱਤ੍ਰ ਅਮਿੱਤ੍ਰ ਸੋਹਿੰਗੇ ॥੨੬॥
transliteration: Pavittra Chittra Chittratan Bachittra Mitra Dhohenge|| Amittra Mittra Bhaavano Su Mittra Amittra Sohenge||26||
translation: The friendship of a queer type will wash and destroy the sanctity of friendship; the friends and enemies will go together for their self-interest.26.

gurmukhi: ਕਲਯੰ ਕ੍ਰਿਤੰ ਕਰੰਮਣੇ ਅਭੱਛ ਭੱਛ ਜਾਹਿੰਗੇ ॥ ਅਕੱਜ ਕੱਜਣੋ ਨਰੰ ਅਧਰਮ ਧਰਮ ਪਾਹਿੰਗੇ ॥
transliteration: Kalyan Kritan Karanmano Abhachchh Jaahenge|| Akajj Kajjno Naran Adharam Dharma Paahenge||
translation: Amongst the works of the Iron Age will be the eating of the uneatables, the things worth concealing will come in the open and the dharma will be realise dform the paths of unrighteousness;

gurmukhi: ਸੁਧਰਮ ਧਰਮ ਧੋਹਿ ਹੈਂ ਧ੍ਰਿਤੰ ਧਰਾ ਧਰੇਸਣੰ ॥ ਅਧਰਮ ਪਰਮਣੰ ਧ੍ਰਿਤੰ ਕੁਕਮ ਕਰਮਣੋ ਕ੍ਰਿਤੰ ॥੨੭॥
transliteration: Sudharam Dharma Dhoh(i) Bain Dhritan Dharaa Ddaresnan|| Adharam Parmanan Dhritan Koukaram Karmano Kritan||27||
translation: The kings of the earth will do the work of destroying dharma; the life of adharma will be considered authentic and the bad actions will be considered worth doing.27.

gurmukhi: ਕਿ ੳੁਲੰਘ ਧਰਮ ਕਰਮਣੌ ਅਧਰਮ ਧਰਮ ਬਿਅਾਪ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸੁ ਤਿਅਾਗ ਜੱਗਿ ਜਾਪਣੋ ਅਜੋਗ ਜਾਪ ਜਾਪ ਹੈਂ ॥
transliteration: Ki Ulanh Dharma Karmanau Adharam Dharma Bilaap Bain|| Su Tiaag Jagg(i) Jaaapano Ajog Jaap Bain||
translation: The people will neglect religion and the bad religious path will prevail everywhere; forsaking the Yajnas and the repetition of the Name, people will repeat the worthless mantras;

gurmukhi: ਸੁ ਧਰਮ ਕਰਮਣੰ ਭਯੋ ਅਧਰਮ ਕਰਮ ਨਿਰਭ੍ਰਮੰ ॥ ਸੁ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਕ੍ਰਤੰ ਚਿਤੰ ਅਸਾਧ ਨਿਰਭਯੰ ਡੁਲੰ ॥੨੮॥
transliteration: Su Dharma Karmanan Bhayo Adharam Karam Nirbhramannd || Su Saadh Sankraran Chitan Asaadh Nirbhayan Dulan||28||
translation: They will unhesitatingly consider the actions of adharma as dharma; the saints will roam with dubious mind and the wicked people will move fearlessly.28.

gurmukhi: ਅਧਰਮ ਕਰਮਣੋ ਕ੍ਰਿਤੰ ਸੁ ਧਰਮ ਕਰਮਣੋ ਤਜੰ ॥ ਪ੍ਹਰਖ ਬਰਖਣੰ ਧਨੰ ਨ ਕਰਖ ਸਰਬਤੋ ਨ੍ਰਿਪੰ ॥
transliteration: Adharam Karmano Kritan Su Dharma Karmano Tajan|| Praharkh Barkhanan Dhanan Na Karakh Sarbado Nripan||
translation: The people will perform the actions of adharma, abandoning the actions of dharma; the kings will forsake the weapons of bow and arrows;

gurmukhi: ਅਕੱਜ ਕੱਜਣੋ ਕ੍ਰਿਤੰ ਨ੍ਰਿਲੱਜ ਸਰਬਤੇ ਫਿਰੰ ॥ ਅਨਰਥ ਬਰਤਿਤੰ ਭੁਅੰ ਨ ਅਰਥ ਕੱਥਤੰ ਨਰੰ ॥੨੯॥
transliteration: Akajj Kajjno Kritan Nrilajj Sarbade Phiran || Anarth Bartitan Bhuan Na Arth Katthatan Naran||29||
translation: Making the announcement of wicked action, the people .will roam unashamedly; there will be misconduct on the earth and the people will perform useless tasks.29.

gurmukhi: ਬਰਨ ਹੈ ਅਬਰਨ ਕੋ ॥ ਛਾਡਿ ਹਰਿ ਸ਼ਰਨ ਕੋ ॥੩੦॥
transliteration: Baran Hai Abaran Ko || Chhaad(i) Har(i) Sharan Ko||30
translation: Castelessness will be the caste and all will forsake the refuge of the Lord.30.

gurmukhi: ਛਾਡ ਸਭ ਸਾਜ ਕੋ ॥ ਲਾਗ ਹੈ ਅਕਾਜ ਕੋ ॥੩੧॥
transliteration: Chhaad Sabh Saaj Ko|| Laag Hai Akaaj Ko||31
translation: All the people will forsake good actions and will absorb themselves in wicked actions.31.

gurmukhi: ਤਯਾਗ ਹੈ ਨਾਮ ਕੋ ॥ ਲਾਗ ਹੈ ਕਾਮ ਕੋ ॥੩੨॥
transliteration: Tyaag Hai Naam Ko|| Laag Hai Akaaj Ko||32||
translation: All of them will abandon the remembrance of the name of the Lord, and will remain absorbed in sexual enjoyment.32.

gurmukhi: ਲਾਜ ਕੌ ਛੋਰ ਹੈ ॥ ਦਾਨ ਮੁਖ ਮੋਰ ਹੈ ॥੩੩॥
transliteration: Laaj Kau Chhodh Hai|| Daan Moukh Mor Hai||33
translation: They will not feel shy (of the wicked acts) and will refrain from the bestowal of charity. 33
